message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this item for a very reasonable price of $11,500.  I think it will be very valuable to you. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $11,500 is a bit higher than I'm willing to go right now. I'd be happy to pay $10,500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm confident this product is worth more than that. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?

Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $11,000 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm sticking with my previous offer of $10,500. If you're not willing to accept that, I may have to look at other options.
